documentation.name: Online documentation
documentation.description: Makes online documentation for all modules available under the /docs path.

api-documentation.name: Online API documentation
api-documentation.description: Makes online documentation extracted from JsDoc comments from libraries and services in all modules available under the /apidocs path.

manifest-repository-resolution.name: Manifest repository resolution
manifest-repository-resolution.description: Uses information from module manifests to find the URL of the repository containing a file. This is used by the documentation and API documentation features to build edit buttons and links to source code. This feature requires a token implementation to be enabled in order to function properly.
